@Electrical_field_2D/potential_distrib.m

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 % =====================================================================
00002 %> @brief potential_distrib calculates potential distrubution 
00003 %>
00004 %> @param method - method of calculation of coefficients
00005 %>         'gauss' - (default) using gauss law (integral eqation)
00006 %>         'kirchhof' - calculating potential using capacitor mesh and
00007 %>          Kirchhof law
00008 %>         'finite difference' - not implemented
00009 %>
00010 %> @retval V potential distribution vector of maps
00011 % =====================================================================
00012 function [V]=potential_distrib(ef_obj,method)
00013 
00014 global data_type
00015 
00016 disp 'potential distribution - calculating';
00017 
00018 discret_matrix_size=ef_obj.discret_matrix_size;
00019 pidxx=ef_obj.pidx;
00020 iidx=ef_obj.iidx;
00021 B_map=ef_obj.B_map;
00022 number_of_electrodes=ef_obj.number_of_electrodes;
00023 eps_map=ef_obj.eps_map;
00024 
00025 A = ef_obj.pot_matrix(discret_matrix_size,pidxx,iidx,eps_map,method);
00026 
00027 
00028 parfor el=1:number_of_electrodes
00029     BV(:,el) = reshape(B_map(:,:,el),discret_matrix_size*discret_matrix_size,1);
00030 end
00031 
00032 % only selected pixels ()
00033 pidx = pidxx;
00034 band = discret_matrix_size; 
00035 for el=1:number_of_electrodes
00036     for i=1:size(pidx,1)
00037         bv(band+i,el) = BV(pidx(i,1),el);
00038     end
00039 end
00040 bv(band*2+size(pidx,1),number_of_electrodes) = 0;
00041 
00042 size(pidxx);
00043 size(bv);
00044 
00045 % potential distribution calculations (for electrode.num stimulations)
00046 
00047 % upper triangular form of matrix (thomas2)
00048 [A,bd]=ef_obj.thomas2(discret_matrix_size,discret_matrix_size,A,number_of_electrodes,bv);
00049 
00050 % solveLU
00051 v = zeros(discret_matrix_size^2,1,data_type);
00052 for el=1:number_of_electrodes
00053     
00054     vt = ef_obj.solveLU(discret_matrix_size,A,bd(:,el));
00055     % version with inverse
00056     % vt = inv(A)*bv(:,el);
00057     
00058     % all pixels
00059     for i=1:size(pidx,1)
00060             %if pidx(i)~=0
00061                 v(pidx(i)) = vt(i+band);
00062             %end
00063     end    
00064 
00065     V(:,:,el)=reshape(v, discret_matrix_size,discret_matrix_size);
00066     
00067 end;
00068 
00069 disp 'potential distribution. done.';
